categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A former Sith only known as Ronin wandered the galaxy. Accompanied by a droid and his lightsaber, Ronin traveled through the Outer Rim Territories and pledged no allegiance to any Jedi clan. Ronin did not speak about his past and events interrupted his self-imposed exile. He was eventually forced to duel a bandit that claimed the title of Sith.
